Manager, Business Development : Urban Gaz Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Urban Gaz Limited Manager, Business Development Application Deadline : 06 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 28 to 40 years Location: Dhaka (Khilkhet) Salary: Tk. 28000 - 40000 (Monthly) Experience: 2 to 5 years Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Bachelor in Engineering (BEngg) in Mechanical Engineering Bachelor in Engineering (BEngg) in Electrical & Electronic Engineering Bachelor in Engineering (BEngg) in Industrial Engineering Bachelor in Engineering (BEngg) in Petroleum and Mineral Resource Engineering Experience 2 to 5 years The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): LPG Gas/Cylinder Gas, Fuel/Petroleum, Power, Business-to-Business (B2B) Software and Services Startup, Engineering Firms, Industrial Machineries (Generator, Diesel Engine etc.) Additional Requirements Age 28 to 40 years Responsibilities & Context Identify & develop B2B business opportunities in oil & gas, energy & industrial sectors. Build & maintain relationships with corporate clients & institutional buyers. Prepare technical-commercial proposals, presentations & solution pitches. Coordinate with engineering teams to develop tailored solutions. Support tender participation, vendor onboarding & strategic partnership development. Represent the company in meetings, site visits & industry engagements. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Job Location Dhaka (Khilkhet) Apply Procedure Email Your CV Send your CV to the given email hr@urbangaz.com or Email your CV from My Bdjobs account Company Information Urban Gaz Limited Follow Address: Shanti Niketon - 18/Ka, Panir Pump Mor, Khilkhet, Dhaka - 1229 Website: https://urbangaz.com/ Business: Urban Gaz is a next-generation energy service provider specializing in safe, reliable, and efficient LPG distribution for residential buildings. The company operates through a modern reticulated supply network supported by a dual-manifold storage system, ensuring uninterrupted gas availability without the customer having to manage cylinders.

Each apartment is equipped with a post-paid or pre-paid gas flow meter, enabling precise consumption measurement and billing aligned with BERC-approved tariffs. Urban Gaz offers fully digital billing, online payment facilities, and proactive service support, including refilling operations, real-time storage monitoring, and periodic maintenance.

With a commitment to operational excellence, transparent pricing, and industry-standard safety protocols, Urban Gaz delivers a hassle-free energy experience that enhances residential comfort and sets a new benchmark for urban utility services. Responsibilities & Context Techno Teams, a leading IT company, is seeking dynamic and ambitious individuals to join our team as Video Editor. We are looking for talented Video Editing Enthusiasts seeking Job opportunities to advance their careers in the Graphics and Video Editing industry Key Responsibilities Include: Creative thinking mindset with attention to detail and excellent time-management, prioritizing, and multitasking skills Comfortable in a small, fast-paced startup environment and eager to learn from a senior with multiple years of experience Desire to have a growth mindset, be self-motivated, have a positive attitude, and be willing to share and contribute knowledge Passion for reaching audiences and connecting with people through creative ideas Familiarity with online resources to speed up the work process Amazing video composition and presentation skills to visualize and convey brand and business messages. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Video content creating Video Editing Compensation & Other Benefits Yearly Salary Review 2 Festival Bonus Full-time job with a competitive salary Opportunity for career advancement Professional-level skill development With skills and expertise, you can also join as our Full-Time Members (3-months probation period), Opportunity of learning from and being guided by our Senior Video Editor. You can also join as a full-time paid Intern and start career with a boost. Science and Technology Chittagong (USTC) ড্রাইভার / Driver Application Deadline : 21 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Chattogram Salary: Negotiable Experience: At least 7 years Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education SSC Experience At least 7 years Additional Requirements বিআরটিএ কর্তৃক বৈধ পেশাদার ড্রাইভিং লাইসেন্স আবশ্যক। ট্রাফিক আইন সম্পর্কে ধারণা ও তা মেনে চলার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে। হালকা অথবা মধ্যম যানবাহন চালনার বৈধ লাইসেন্স থাকতে হবে। সাপ্তাহিক ছুটির দিনে, সরকারি ছুটির দিনে এবং প্রয়োজন অনুযায়ী কাজ করার মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে। অভিজ্ঞতাসম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের ক্ষেত্রে বয়স ও শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতা শিথিলযোগ্য। যানবাহন রক্ষণাবেক্ষণে দক্ষতা এবং যোগাযোগের দক্ষতা সম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের অগ্রাধিকার দেওয়া হবে। Responsibilities & Context ইউনিভার্সিটি অফ সায়েন্স এন্ড টেকনোলজি চট্টগ্রাম (ইউএসটিসি) **দায়িত্ব এবং প্রেক্ষাপট** গাড়ির নিয়মিত রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ করতে হবে ও পরিস্কার পরিছন্ন রাখতে হবে। ডিউটিতে যাওয়ার পূর্বে গাড়িতে রক্ষিত কাগজপত্র, ব্যাটারী, টায়ার পরীক্ষা করতে হবে। গাড়ির মবিল, রেডিয়েটর, ক্লাচ অয়েল, পাওয়ার অয়েল, ফ্যানবেল্ট, এসি বেল্ট ইত্যাদি ঠিকমত আছে কিনা তা নিয়মিত পরীক্ষা করতে হবে এবং সমস্যা দেখা দিলে তা যথাযথ কর্তৃপক্ষকে অতি দ্রুত অবহিত করতে হবে। গাড়ির ইঞ্জিন সংক্রান্ত সমস্যা নিরূপন ও সমাধানে প্রাথমিক ধারণা থাকতে হবে। গাড়ির কাগজপত্র সংরক্ষণ করা এবং সময়মত কাগজপত্র নবায়নের জন্য অফিসকে অবহিত করতে হবে। Skills & Expertise Driving Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Chattogram Read Before Apply Female Sales & Marketing Executive - Software Sales (Home office) : Glorious IT (Software Company) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Glorious IT (Software Company) Female Sales & Marketing Executive - Software Sales (Home office) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 10 Location: Khulna Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Responsibilities & Context গ্লোরিয়াস আইটি (সফটওয়্যার কোম্পানি) 2014 সাল থেকে আইটি ইন্ডাস্ট্রিতে সুনাম এবং সফলতার সহিত কাজ করে চলেছে। এরই ধারাবাহিকতায় ছোট, বড় ও মাঝারি বিজনেস প্রতিষ্ঠান ডিজিটালাইজেশন ও সফটওয়্যার ব্যবহারে উৎসাহিত করতে সফটওয়্যার সেলস অ্যান্ড মার্কেটিং এক্সিকিউটিভ অফিসার নিয়োগ প্রক্রিয়া চলছে। অনলাইনে কাজ করতে হবে। টেলিকমিউনিকেশন, ফোন কল, অনলাইনে google মিটিং, জুম, এনিডেক্স মিটিং মাধ্যমে ক্লাইন্টকে আমাদের সফটওয়্যারে ডেমো প্রদর্শন ,ট্রেনিং ও সফটওয়্যার এর অসাধারণ কার্যকরী ফিচার ফ্যাসিলিটি সম্পর্কে অবগত করতে হবে। ক্লাইন্টকে সফটওয়্যার ক্রয়ের আগ্রহ তৈরি করতে হবে। আমাদের প্রোডাক্ট সফটওয়্যার, ওয়েবসাইট, Android app ব্যক্তিগত অথবা দলগতভাবে বিক্রয়ের কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা করতে হবে। সুপার শপ ,ডিপার্টমেন্টাল স্টোর , রেস্টুরেন্ট , ফার্মেসি, হসপিটাল, ডায়াগনস্টিক ,স্কুল , বড়, ছোট মাঝারি ব্যবসায়ী প্রতিষ্ঠানের মালিকগণ, কর্পোরেট অফিসের সাথে ডিজিটাল প্লাটফর্মে নিরবিচ্ছিন্ন যোগাযোগ এবং সফটওয়্যার সম্পর্কিত তথ্য আদান-প্রদান করা মাসিক টার্গেট অর্জন করার মন-মানসিকতা থাকতে হবে (অফিস থেকে লিড নাম্বার এবং ইনফরমেশন প্রদান করা হবে)। নিদিষ্ট সময়ে আরোপিত দায়িত্ব সমূহ পালন করতে হবে সফটওয়্যার বিক্রয়ের মাসিক/ বাৎসরিক কর্ম,পরিকল্পনা তৈরী, বাস্তবায়ন দক্ষতা থাকতে হবে। সফটওয়্যার বিক্রয় নিশ্চিত করতে বর্তমান বাজারের প্রবণতা এবং ক্রেতার মনস্তত্ত্ব বোঝার ক্ষমতা থাকতে হবে। নেতৃত্ব দেওয়া এবং একটি শক্তিশালী নেটওয়ার্ক স্থাপন করা। কর্তৃপক্ষ কর্তৃক সংশ্লিষ্ট অন্য সকল দায়িত্ব পালন করতে হবে Skills & Expertise Suggested by Client Relationship Management Market Research Sales & Marketing Workplace Work from home,Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Khulna Company Information Glorious IT (Software Company) Follow Address: 35/2 Haji Mohsin Road, Khulna.

Application Insights View Requirements Education Additional Requirements Age 18 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context অফিসের সময় আমরা আপনাকে ট্রেনিং দিব, এবং আপনাদের প্র্যাক্টিকাল অফিসের কাজ করতে হবে। নীচের বিষয়গুলি নিয়ে আপনার যদি পূর্বের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকে তবে এটি আপনার জন্য একটি সুবিধা হবে। তবে তা না হলে কোনও সমস্যা নেই। নীচের বিষয়গুলি সম্পর্কে আপনাকে শুরু থেকে প্রশিক্ষন দেওয়া হবে। দায়িত্ব: CSS নিয়ে A টু Z শিখানো হবে,এক্সপার্ট লেভেল এর আগ পর্যন্ত নানান টপিকে প্রতিদিন লেসন থাকবে। ওয়েবফ্লো এর ব্যাসিক টুল থেকে শুরু করে এডভ্যান্স সব টুল নিয়েই শিখানো হবে। ফিগমা নিয়ে ব্যাসিক ধারণা দেয়া হবে, যাতে ফিগমা থেকে ওয়েবফ্লো ওয়েবসাইট বানাতে সহজ হয়। ওয়েবফ্লো এক্সপার্টদের সাথে একই টিমে কাজের সুযোগ , যাতে টিম ম্যানেজমেন্ট এর মাধ্যমে বড় প্রোজেক্টে কাজের এক্সপেরিয়েন্স হয়। ওয়েবসাইটের বিভিন্ন ডিভাইসের ডিজাইন রেস্পন্সিভনেস নিয়ে শিখানো হবে। ডেভালোপার এবং ডিজাইন টিমের সাথে একই সাথে কাজ করার জন্য কোলাবোরেশন এবং সিস্টেমে ইন্ট্রিগেড করানো হবে। নিজের পার্সোনাল পোর্টফোলিও তৈরির জন্য গুরুত্ব দেয়া হবে। ওয়েবফ্লো এর পাশাপাশি Framer সহ নানান মার্কেটপ্লেস এবং ওয়েবসাইট বানানোর প্লাটফর্মের প্রশিক্ষন দেয়া হবে যাতে আপনি সামগ্রিক ওয়েব ডেভেলোপার হয়ে উঠতে পারেন। NB: খুলনায় এসে কাজ করতে না পারলে অ্যাপ্লাই না করার জন্য অনুরোধ করা হচ্ছে Skills & Expertise HTML & CSS Suggested by HTML/ DHTML HTML5 & CSS3 React | NodeJS | mongoDB | mongoose | JavaScript | Github | Git Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. job_title: Senior Manager/ AGM- Brand (Fresh Polymer and Paints)
job_description: Senior Manager/ AGM- Brand (Fresh Polymer and Paints) : Meghna Group of Industries. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Meghna Group of Industries. Senior Manager/ AGM- Brand (Fresh Polymer and Paints) Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka (Gulshan) Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Strong strategic brand management capability with proven experience in launching and scaling new brands. Deep understanding of Polymer and Paints market dynamics in Bangladesh. Expertise in 360° marketing (ATL, BTL, TTL, Trade Marketing & Digital Marketing). Strong analytical and data-driven decision-making skills. Budget planning, marketing ROI analysis, and financial acumen. Product launch and go-to-market (GTM) execution expertise. Trade marketing, dealer development, and channel engagement experience. Competitor analysis and market intelligence capability. Strong negotiation and agency management skills. Responsibilities & Context Job Context: Fresh Polymer and Paints Limited (FPPL), a concern of Meghna Group of Industries (MGI), operates in the Polymer and Paints segments across Bangladesh. The company is focused on strengthening its market presence and competing with established local and multinational brands through strategic brand positioning, product innovation, and strong channel engagement. The Senior Manager / AGM – Brand will play a critical strategic role in driving integrated brand management initiatives for both Polymer and Paints categories. The position requires close coordination with Sales, Supply Chain, R&D, and production teams to ensure that marketing strategies are aligned with overall business objectives. Job Responsibilities: Develop long-term brand and portfolio strategies for Fresh Polymer & Paints Ltd by integrating market analytics, stakeholder insights, and competitive assessments to ensure sustainable growth, enhanced brand equity, and strategic market positioning nationwide. Manage 360-degree marketing campaigns by integrating TVC, outdoor, retail branding, and digital activation to increase brand salience among homeowners, dealers, and painters. Manage the product portfolio by aligning pricing, positioning, and value propositions for both polymer and paints segments to maximize profitability and reduce internal product overlap. Drive trade marketing and channel engagement initiatives by designing dealer schemes, distributor incentives, and contractor/painter loyalty programs to enhance secondary sales and channel loyalty. Coordinate new product development and launches by collaborating with R&D, production, and supply chain teams to ensure successful commercialization and strong go-to-market execution. Analyze regional sales data and customer demand

job_description: Project Coordinator (PC) : Association of Voluntary Actions for Society (AVAS) Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Association of Voluntary Actions for Society (AVAS) Project Coordinator (PC) Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 35 to 50 years Location: Patuakhali (Galachipa) Salary: Tk. 75000 - 78000 (Monthly) Published: 19 Feb 2026 Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 50 years Responsibilities & Context Association of Voluntary Actions for Society (AVAS) is a national non-profit, rights-based development organization working since 1998 to improve the lives of vulnerable and marginalized communities across Bangladesh. AVAS implements programs in health, gender equality, child protection, climate resilience, livelihood development, education and humanitarian response through strong community engagement and partnerships with government and international development agencies. The organization is committed to accountability, safeguarding, inclusion and sustainable community development. Project Summary: The RMNCAH (Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn, Child and Adolescent Health) Project aims to improve access to and quality of essential health services for women, newborns, children, and adolescents at community and facility levels. Through community mobilization, technical support, and health system strengthening, the project seeks to reduce preventable maternal, neonatal, and child morbidity and mortality and contribute to improved public health outcomes. Position Summary: The Project Coordinator (PC) will provide overall leadership and operational management of the RMNCAH Project. The position is responsible for planning, implementation, supervision, budget oversight, coordination with stakeholders, and ensuring compliance with donor and organizational standards. The PC will promote safeguarding, gender equality, inclusion, and data-driven decision-making to achieve improved health outcomes. Key Responsibilities Programme Management & Implementation Develop and implement Detailed Implementation Plans (DIP), work plans, and activity schedules aligned with project objectives and budget. Oversee day-to-day project implementation ensuring quality, timelines, and target achievement. Integrate gender equality, safeguarding, disability inclusion, and accountability principles. Conduct regular review meetings and adapt activities based on contextual needs. Technical Leadership-RMNCAH Provide technical guidance on maternal, newborn, child, and adolescent health interventions. Support quality implementation of ANC/PNC services, institutional delivery promotion, essential newborn care, integrated child health services, and adolescent health awareness. Strengthen coordination with public health

Responsibilities & Context Background Atmabiswas is going to implement a sub-project titled “Promoting resilient green growth in dairy subsector through ensuring RECP”. This sub-project aims to increase resource-efficient and resilient green growth of microenterprises (MEs) under Cattle & buffalo sub-sector. The project is jointly financed by the World Bank, Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation (PKSF), and Atmabiswas. Sub-project Objectives To adopt resource efficient, cleaner production and good farming practices. To adopt climate resilient technologies. To promote circular economy. To increase technical knowledge and capacity of the MEs. To assist entrepreneurs in expanding the market for dairy products. Sub-project Working Areas The sub-project will be implemented across Chuadanga Sadar, Alamdanga, Damurhuda, Jibonnagar Upazilla in Chuadanga districts. Duration The employee will initially be hired for a one-year term, with the possibility of extending the contract till 30 June 2028, based on satisfactory performance. His/her duties and responsibilities, which are essential but not limited to: Coordinate project management activities, resources, equipment, and information. Provide strategic direction for project implementation and supervise the project. Identify and mitigate project risks and issues to ensure successful project delivery. job_description: Sr. Technician - R&D and Dry process. : IFL Factory Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List IFL Factory Ltd. Sr. Technician - R&D and Dry process. Application Deadline : 05 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: At least 40 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 40 years Technical Skills: Proficiency in dry processing equipment (mixers, dryers, sifters), analytical instrumentation (e.g., moisture analyzers, particle size analyzers), and data analysis software (Excel, Minitab, or Python). Must be fluent in English. Responsibilities & Context Fashion Forum Ltd is a 100% Oriented Garments Industry looking for highly ambitious and careerist, experienced to work in apparel division for this following positions Job Responsibilities: Experimental Design & Execution: Plan and execute non-standard, high-complexity laboratory experiments and pilot plant trials to develop new products or processes. Dry Process Optimization: Focus on optimizing dry processes such as powder blending, granulation, sieving, and drying techniques to improve efficiency, yield, and quality. Prototype Development: Turn R&D concepts into tangible prototypes, conducting bench-top testing to validate new designs or formulations. Equipment Maintenance & Calibration: Operate, calibrate, and maintain sophisticated R&D instruments and dry processing machinery, performing troubleshooting to minimize downtime. Data Analysis & Reporting: Collect, organize, and analyze complex experimental data, generating technical reports, charts, and summaries for scientists and project leaders. Technical Documentation & SOPs: Develop, write, and update Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) to ensure safety and compliance. Project Leadership & Mentorship: Lead smaller projects, coordinate with cross-functional teams (e.g., QC, production, engineering), and mentor junior technicians on technical procedures and safety protocols. Employment Status Full Time Job Location Anywhere in Bangladesh Apply Procedure Hard Copy http://idsbd.com Company Information IFL Factory Ltd. Follow Address: 140, DHOUR, Uttara, Turag, Dhaka-1230 Business: IFL Factory Ltd. is a fast growing company serving customers across the globe providing quality product and indispensable services. The company has carved itself a niche for providing best product with unbeatable quality at competitive prices. Aim of the company is to become a brand in itself with a focused and dynamic team. Assistant General Manager/ Manager- Sales (Land, Hotels & Resorts) Real-estate : Aasceend Property Development Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Aasceend Property Development Limited Assistant General Manager/ Manager- Sales (Land, Hotels & Resorts) Real-estate Application Deadline : 18 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: At most 40 years Location: Dhaka (DOHS Baridhara) Salary: Negotiable Published: 19 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years Responsibilities & Context Sales Strategy & Execution: Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve company sales targets. Lead, guide, and monitor the sales team to maximize performance and revenue. Identify new sales opportunities, market trends, and customer needs to optimize sales plans. Business Development: Establish and maintain strong relationships with potential buyers, investors, and corporate clients. Collaborate with marketing teams for lead generation and brand awareness initiatives. Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify new opportunities. Team Leadership & Performance Management: Supervise, train, and motivate the sales team to enhance productivity and efficiency. Set individual and team sales targets and ensure their achievement. Conduct regular sales meetings, performance reviews, and skill development programs. Customer Relationship Management: Ensure excellent customer service throughout the sales process. Address client queries, concerns, and objections professionally and efficiently. Build and maintain long-term relationships with existing and potential customers. Sales Operations & Reporting: Oversee the entire sales process, from inquiry to closing deals. Monitor sales progress, prepare reports, and present findings to senior management. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and transactions. Compliance & Coordination: Ensure all sales activities comply with company policies and real estate regulations. Work closely with legal, finance, and project teams to streamline sales operations. Collaborate with marketing and branding teams for promotional activities. Strong networking and relationship-building skills. A proactive and result-oriented mindset. Willingness to travel as required.
